lender.name: Thomas, New York
lender.loan_because: I fully endorse the concept of Microfinance and am convinced that it can make a difference in many people's lives.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I know how difficult it was for me to get a loan from a traditional banking institution to begin a business many years ago. I can only imagine how much more challenging it would be in another country with limited access to capital markets. I am honoured to play a part towards expanding entreprenurial independence. Congratulations to those hard working men and women who have a dream to better themselves and their famillies.
lender.occupational_info:
My business is helping others to see themselves as unique and capable of rising above mediocrity.
To help people become all that God designed them to be.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: everyone needs a helping hand every once and a while.
lender.occupational_info: I make sure that the natural gas gets safely to the people that need it to keep there homes warm.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: "Without knowing who I am and why I am here, life is impossible. The sole meaning of life is to serve humanity." ~Leo Tolstoy
lender.occupational_info: I work for a major newspaper company in the United States as a sales & marketing manager, editorial board member, and interactive media specialist.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I loan because I want to be able to help other people.

lender.name: Professor D
lender.loan_because: I wish to help those that have the drive to make their ideas into reality.
lender.occupational_info: I teach people about theatre and communications.

lender.name: Douglas & Laura
lender.loan_because: We can have a direct impact and help build a sustainable micro-economy for those that have a passion to succeed and improve their life for themselves and the people around them.
lender.occupational_info: We work with teams to design retail and restaurants.

lender.name: Molly & Merlin
lender.occupation: Senior IT Manager Nike, & Financial Aid Tech
lender.loan_because: This is an amazing opportunity to reach out to people who are trying to better their own circumstances but simply need a small bit of temporary assistance to do so...
lender.occupational_info: We are both very fortunate to have the life we do. It's great to be able to easily help other people better their lives as well.

lender.name: Pats, Grant & Risa
lender.loan_because: Our philosophy is - Give as much as you can, as often as you're able.

lender.name: ...andrian...
lender.loan_because: I want to give people in developing countries a chance to succeed and pursue happiness. I am particularly interested in helping people from Ukraine, my home country, prosper!
lender.occupational_info: I design and build buildings/sites for my company across the United States.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I believe it's our duty to help others
lender.occupational_info: I run a computer software company

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: after a couple of years or so, all my loans have been repaid and I've simply turned the money over into new loans. Great program.

lender.name: marci
lender.loan_because: my daughters gave me this opportunity for christmas 2008!
lender.occupational_info: i am a NICU nurse-neonatal intensive care unit- where i take care of sick and premature babies and their families

lender.name: Tolu
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone should have the opportunity to build something of their own and lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Karla
lender.loan_because: I am blessed. Micah 6:8 What does God desire of me? Do justice, love kindness, and walk humbly with Him.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young children with developmental disabilities. My goal is to help them catch up with their age-peers.

lender.name: Cynthia and Jeff
lender.loan_because: In our travels to other countries, we have been amazed the the power of each dollar in changing the lives of others. Person to person loans will help alleviate poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a teacher who works with students who have problems with learning and with their behavior. Jeff works in a huge book store, an entire city block, three stories tall.

lender.name: Rui Pinto
lender.loan_because: I want to help

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: ..To make one human being happier.. one creature more comfortable..one heart more hopeful..this is our work!!
lender.occupational_info: ... Business Consulting..

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: I love being about to work with other people around the world, both fellow lenders and the lendees.
lender.occupational_info: I help students build decent homes with those in need.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I spent a couple of years in South America and have seen how many of the people live. I want to help those that are trying to improve their situations and that don't enjoy many of the comforts of life we have in the USA.
lender.occupational_info: I provide banking and financing solutions to corporate customers in my region of the United States.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: I believe together we can eradicate poverty and give families real options to take care of themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Christian minister working in a rural and suburban context in a progressive liberal denomination.

lender.name: Wolfe Family
lender.loan_because: The love of Christ compells us. He has given us so much to be thankful for.

lender.name: SÃ©rgio
lender.loan_because: I want to foster entrepreneurship worldwide
lender.occupational_info: I do great things using the Web as a canvas and as a communication channel.

lender.name: Adam
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to help spread prosperity.
lender.occupational_info: Independent consulting

lender.name: Isabelle E.
lender.loan_because: I was a single mother in the United States and barely made ends meet for many years. I can't imagine what it must be like for a woman in Tanzania. I intend to loan to single mothers supporting their families with art. I hope to share their experience with my young art students.
lender.occupational_info: I teach art to 500 elementary students. We study the arts of other cultures and times and practice things like calligraphy that you see in the background of my photograph.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: I hope to make a positive difference in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I teach.

lender.name: Nikkia
lender.loan_because: I understand that these loans have the ability to change individuals, families, communities, countries and ultimately our world for the better!
lender.occupational_info: Ironically....helping individuals, families and communities live up to their potenial.

lender.name: Charlie & Marianne
lender.occupational_info: we are both in mental health services

lender.name: Angelica
lender.loan_because: I simply can!

lender.name: Mr. Allison
lender.loan_because: We loan because we would like to make a diffrence in this world. We want everyone to know we care.
lender.occupational_info: We are full time students. It is extremely hard being in Mr. Allison's class. We work all day and when we get home we have homework! However, we all know it's worth the hard work now for our success in the future!

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: My Aunt gave me a gift certificate to get involed.
lender.occupational_info: High school student

lender.name: Julie Bean
lender.loan_because: I want to help ease the burden for even one person out there. Especially those that are trying to make an honest living even though they may live in difficult circumstances.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place for everyone.
lender.occupational_info: I work at a newspaper, directing news coverage of our community.

lender.name: Christy
lender.loan_because:
So little, does so much, not just for the one; but helps many.
How easy is this!
lender.occupational_info:
For 34.5 years, I worked as a Deputy Clerk of the Circuit Court in the County courthouse in Sarasota, FL. I did all the Criminal Searches, plus deeds, leins etc.
I now have retired to Dahlonega, GA
I am the creator of Christy's Bluebird Project helping to bring Bluebirds back in quanity. There are now,over 90 Bluebird Trails in the Sarasota Manatee area, which have been put up since 2002. Through those Bluebird Trails, and other individuals, 800 plus bird houses have been set out. My Bluebird Monitors report shows over 600 Bluebird fledgings each year. I then can report their reported breeding information to Cornell University, or they now can report directly themselves. I now am expanding my project to include Georgia.
I also sponsor 3 kids in 3 different countries. Through www.Galilee.org , The Plan, and Compassion.
Helping kids and their school and communities, is great. and now I can help adults through www.kiva.org individuals or groups, to help themselves, which then will help their communities.

lender.name: Shaylin
lender.loan_because: I like to feel like I'm making a difference

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I can't think of a better way to share the good fortune I've enjoyed in my life.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I truly would like to make a difference in the lives of other people.

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: I want to help save the world, one person at a time. I know that sounds naive, but it is true. I especially want to help women in Africa, South America and Asia, as in many cultures in these parts of the world women often have second-class status.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired university professor. I did cancer and AIDS research for many years. I still teach a course on AIDS ("AIDS: biomedical, social and ethical issues"). I am particularly concerned about the impact AIDS has had in Sub-Saharan Africa.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: it is a personal way to be involved in helping others lift themselves out of poverty.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I want to share. My family is so fortunate. God bless and Peace!

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed and I want to help out where I can.

lender.name: Charlette
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Corporate cog.

lender.name: Marko
lender.loan_because: I want to help people in developing countries to be able to help themselves and be proud of taking care of their children and families. Additionally I want to in general promote entrepreneurship around the world.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: I believe working at the grassroots level is a more effective way of reaching those who would not normally be given loans by bigger institutions.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: I am so very blessed!
lender.occupational_info: I am so blessed to work in jobs where I am able to help others. I work for a program that assists those who are handicapped and those who have children that are sick or injured and are far away from home.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference in someone else's life... and mine too.
lender.occupational_info: Keeping things organized and efficient as best I can!

lender.name: gabriella and mom
lender.loan_because: it makes us feel more connected to the world.
lender.occupational_info: neverending

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: People are not as fortunate as me so I need to help people keep their daily lives a float and thriving so they can help their economy and their families.

lender.name: Aaron & Andrea
lender.loan_because: it gives people opportunities

lender.name: Thebluestbutterfly
lender.loan_because: I can at least help a little bit in this troubled world.

lender.name: Patrick
lender.loan_because: I want to help improve the lives of others.

lender.name: Carl
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because:
People with access to resources receive a moral and spiritual benefit from sharing them with those with less access. Access is a result of multiple factors, many of them unearned, such as shared cultural assumptions, birth, education, or privilege.
Only by acknowledging our privilege and our reliance on institutionalized patterns of exploitation and domination can we begin to heal ourselves and our planet. I envision a future in which new patterns of partnership and collaboration replace domination systems, and microlending is an important part of building that future.
lender.occupational_info: I write documentation that helps people understand how to use database software. People use these databases for a great variety of purposes, some of which are beneficial to society.

lender.name: Tom & Amy
lender.loan_because: People who are trying to help themselves are an inspiration. It is a joy to assist them on their journey toward a better way of life.
lender.occupational_info: I have been a teacher for more than 15 years. I enjoy teaching children to read. My husband has worked for a large oil company for more than 25 years. He helps to identify new catalysts and identifies unknown contaminants.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: I want people to see they can transform their own lives with just a little help. Sometimes a loan is all that is needed to help someone improve his or her life.
lender.occupational_info: I oversee the entire computer systems for a global company.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves the opportunity to prosper and grow.
lender.occupational_info: My job allows me to enhance access to health care by convincing physicians and hospitals to open their doors to the poor.

lender.name: Chul Kyo
lender.loan_because: I know how much help people can get from our microcredit loans. I know how frustrating it is when I have the initiative but lack the resources to do something.
lender.occupational_info: I study, preparing to study in American universities. Currently a senior.

lender.name: SolaMathe
lender.loan_because: Several reasons: * I believe it is another avenue for Christ to minister through. * I personally care. * If these people believe in themselves to make an impact in their community, that is something I want to support. * I believe greater economic position opens doors of opportunity.

lender.name: kay
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: kiva makes the world a better place - one entrepreneur at a time
lender.occupational_info: I advise companies on how to improve the experiences they offer to customers

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance in life
lender.occupational_info: I've traveled the world and have seen so many people in need. This is a great chance to make a difference!

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I feel it is the obligation of people to help other people however they can I am lucky enough to have enough money to be able to lend so I do.

lender.name: Beate
lender.loan_because: Because I want everybody to live a liveable life.

lender.name: v.k.
lender.loan_because: to do better for the needy people
lender.occupational_info: with the help of an advisor in any field the person can reach to the highest

lender.name: Femke
lender.loan_because: It gives me a good feeling to make a world of difference to people I don't even know with a small amount of money. Our princess Maxima is a great advocate for microcredit and on Oprah I heard of Kiva. So these women gave me this idea to make a contribution to developmental aid.

lender.name: RobiNZ
lender.loan_because: It's income from something I do for fun. The amount wouldn't change my standard of living but might help someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I use design software for work, write about it on my blog for fun

lender.name: Harrie
lender.loan_because: I want to help people

lender.name: julia
lender.loan_because: "It is better to light a candle, than to curse the darkness"

lender.name: Scott
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to help people help themselves by implementing their ideas using their own ingenuity, commitment and hard work
lender.occupational_info: I work to get tropical forests sustainably managed and this involves a lot of work with indigenous and local communities

lender.name: Catharina
lender.loan_because: I know that it can make a big differense to someone who wants to change her life, make it better for herself and her children
lender.occupational_info: I travel as tour leader with swedish tourists all over the world

lender.name: Fabiana
lender.loan_because: I'm a advocate , I work on city hall of my city and I would like to open my proper business. Meu husband is doctor veterinarian ago fourteen years and exists a house for rent besides our clinic in a optimal dot commercial.
lender.occupational_info: Highly profitable because we've four thousand customers cadastral , the dot commercial is extremely busy and we've experience of fourteen years in that business.

lender.name: Dale & Christine
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a helping hand at some point in time. After having a student from the Central African Republic live with us for many years, we learned to appreciate how difficult life can be for people in developing countries and how hard they will work to better their lives if given an opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: Christine is now retired, but was a director of human relations for a major spice company. Dale, also retired, was a university geography teacher and a travel tour company owner.

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: Although I don't have large amounts of money to give away, Kiva lets me help others.
lender.occupational_info: College students come to my office to talk about dealing with school work and college life, and I try to help them.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I have worked first hand with micro-financing in Afghanistan and have seen the positive impact it has on people's lives.

lender.name: Silvia
lender.loan_because: A small gesture can have a big impact....

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance.

lender.name: McGrath Family - Canada
lender.loan_because: Kiva sounds like a great way to try and help

lender.name: Daan & Robin
lender.loan_because: Start with a small gesture that can change the world. Make it a better place for everyone!!

lender.name: Miosotis
lender.loan_because: getting people out of poverty is the first step to environmental preservation

lender.name: Kieron
lender.loan_because: Kiva sounds like a wonderful way to help people who would never be visible to international aid agencies.
lender.occupational_info: I represent people who have been taken advantage of by money lenders and sellers of goods.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone should have the same opportunities to access financial resources, not only to achieve economic prosperity but especially to increase with their works and projects, happiness and self-esteem.

lender.name: M&T
lender.loan_because: Giving back something, anything, is better than nothing..... so the world is a better place.
lender.occupational_info: M is an Insurance Agent helping to protect people everyday. T works at an elementary school and helps students with special needs.

lender.name: Jennifer and Jason
lender.loan_because: what better way to make a change in someone's life.

lender.name: Guy
lender.loan_because: So many people talk about helping others...but never do anything about it... It is amazing to see how I can make a big difference in someone's life by giving just a litle...

lender.name: PozVibes
lender.loan_because: I'm amazed that a small act on my part can join with the actions of others to make a big impact on the life of someone else

lender.name: Graham/Paul
lender.loan_because: We are very lucky and we feel it important to share some of our good fortune.

lender.name: Rolf
lender.loan_because: It's a brilliant idea
lender.occupational_info: Teaching psychology

lender.name: Jim
lender.loan_because: I like the idea of helping people who are trying to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I build websites that try to sell you things.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: such a small amount of help can make a big difference in someone's life.

lender.name: per
lender.loan_because: It is wonderful to be able to help people and with a rather small effort make a difference for someone else!
lender.occupational_info: Im a deputy project manager for Scandinavias largest tourism fair in Gothenburg! The name of the fair is TUR and attract approx 40 000 visitors each spring!

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: Those who can, should.
lender.occupational_info: Go to meetings, write reports, attend conference calls, make fancy graphs and charts. All the things that make America tick.

lender.name: Roger
lender.loan_because: I want to help people achieve their goals and help their families and friends.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a marketer - helping change the world one small loan at a time.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I think we need more sharing and caring in the world
lender.occupational_info: I teach.

lender.name: Lane
lender.loan_because: I feel God has put all of us on this earth to help each other.
lender.occupational_info: I promote a company that sends care givers to elders homes to help make their day easier and better.

lender.name: Phillips/Cullor families
lender.loan_because: The Phillips and Cullor families have made a tradition each Christmas to donate to a charity. When we found out about Kiva, we thought this is a perfect charity because it is a gift that keeps on giving!

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: I want to make every dollar live up to its value.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: we are all on this journey of life together and we should help each other along the way.

lender.name: cristina
lender.loan_because: We can make god things happen!

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: artist

lender.name: Jane
lender.loan_because: This is what I love to do! You get more than you give as they say.

lender.name: Mollie
lender.loan_because: If I needed more money to survive I would hope people would lend to me.

lender.name: Steve, Ashley, and Kenendy
lender.loan_because: We are trying to teach our 6 year-old the value of money, but more importantly, the values of love, kindness, and helping others.

lender.name: Vicky
lender.loan_because: We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a crisis center, primarily with people who are psychotic or suicidal. They may need just support or may need to go to a psychiatric hospital.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: I live in a country with so many opportunities, I would like to help others in the world have the same opportunities that I do.

lender.name: Stephane
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: In a business, my job is to get the product or service to those who can use it. It involves the product or service's development, pricing, promotion and distribution.

lender.name: John and Aubra
lender.loan_because: We Care.

lender.name: Lauri
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and want to share that . It feels good to give some one a hand-up.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I root for the underdog and I love helping people more than anything else.
lender.occupational_info: I do whatever the engineering/ environmental consulting company that I work for tells me to do. When I'm not working I love backpacking and foosball.

lender.name: Katrina
lender.loan_because: I want to help support other people who are trying to help themselves and their communities. When I get more, I give more.
lender.occupational_info: I am an artist working in multidisicipline. I work with imges and words of women and people who have made a difference in this world. I am a professional seamstress and crafts person. I build costumes for Broadway shows, films and the circus.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I do not have everything that I desire, but I have seen people around the world who need it more than I do. They need a fair chance and opportunity to make it on their own and I hope that I can be just a miniscule catalyst for them to reach their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: My job is a technical business consultant for a very large global company. But my work and dreams go much further than making a global company succeed. The world will never be fair, but I will do what I can to put those in need, on a level playing field with the rest of the world.

lender.name: MorÃ­n & Henrik
lender.loan_because: We want to promote entrepreneurship and solidarity.
lender.occupational_info: Project Manager & Software Developer

lender.name: Derek
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do. Living in a very prosperous country, I feel we should help others that are attempting to help themselves.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: When I read the news I feel so helpless and this is a little thing to do to help someone in another part of the world. It personalizes the tremendous struggles others face and I hope it gives recipients hope knowing there are people out there rooting for them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired teacher and now photography helps me to see rather than just look and has opened my eyes to beauty all around me.

lender.name: Viki
lender.loan_because: This is one way I can help others.
lender.occupational_info: I work in an office on computer software projects.

lender.name: Mark & Janette
lender.loan_because: It's always nicer to help someone else in need. No matter how big or small. We only hope that this puts a smile on someone else's face, as it did on ours.
lender.occupational_info: Mark has worked in a Grocery Store for 15 years. Janette has worked in a Department Store for the past couple months. We both enjoy our jobs and helping others, but our greatest accomplishment is that we have 3 great children at home.

lender.name: Ashley
lender.loan_because: you have to "be the change you want to see in the world"

lender.name: Mee Neang
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I cook at a restaurant.

lender.name: Steven & Jacq
lender.loan_because: We love the idea of Kiva. Helping people to help themselves.. and with this philosophy, it enables us to help the beautiful people of Indonesia, especially the Balinese.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I wanted my nieces and nephew and I to do something together that would help make a positive impact in other people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help nurses and hospital workers advocate for themselves and their patients.

lender.name: Hope
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I do Algebra, English, Chemistry, Human Geography, and Latin classes at my school ;)

lender.name: Heather, ON, Canada
lender.loan_because: I have seen what these loans can do for people. I am particularly partial to helping women.
lender.occupational_info: I am a storyteller. I use stories to help people advertise their businesses.

lender.name: Brett, Pullman, WA
lender.loan_because: I enjoy the act of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a special education teacher. I will teach students with special needs.

lender.name: PZ
lender.loan_because: I want to help those who can't help themselves.

lender.name: John & Christine
lender.loan_because: it's easy to make a little difference!

lender.name: Gabriel
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that lends to non-profit organizations and helps them own real estate.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: God has blessed our family. We hope that these loans will in some small way help out the families receiving them!

lender.name: Mr. Bean
lender.loan_because: I like being able to directly assist the poor, while knowing that the loan will be used wisely and under guidance, so that I am not fostering dependence, but rather progress and independence.

lender.name: The Hendersons
lender.loan_because: Life has been good to us, we hope to make life better for others as well.
lender.occupational_info: Senior Executive in a Software Company

lender.name: Matti
lender.occupation: General Secratary of a student union

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I'm lucky.

lender.name: Bob & Selia
lender.loan_because: I wish to share from my good fortune with those working for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I have retired after a career as an administrator in large manufacturing companies. I now enjoy volunteering in service organizations which help people in need.

lender.name: Phil
lender.occupational_info: I manage people who write computer programs for the state of Ohio

lender.name: Pat
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping hardworking people.
lender.occupational_info: I sell computer software to teachers that will help them teach children in schools.

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I want to help people :)
lender.occupational_info: My name is Matt, I go to school.

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.loan_because: I want to share what I have and make the world a better place. I believe that the people I can sponsor through Kiva just need a little help.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I grew disillusioned with traditional charity where paid students with clipboards try to sign you up on the street.
lender.occupational_info: I work in journalism, trying to make sense of climate change, health issues, environmental issues etc...

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I have been really blessed, have been given a big break in my life, and therefore would love to give others an opportunity to reach their dreams.

lender.name: Kat
lender.loan_because: I think people with a vision deserve the funding to see it through.
lender.occupational_info: I am a horse trainer

lender.name: Paul Williams
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in the world, by helping others make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I help people find solutions for their problems.

lender.name: Lucy
lender.loan_because: I love people and food(especially food) so I really felt like I should help someone in the restaurant business. Food is good.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make sure all of our cat family get along.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: I've done a lot of travel in Africa and Asia and have seen the impact of giving someone a chance...

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.loan_because: I want to support folks who are in need to become self sufficient. I have a particularl in terest i Guaemala and Mexico and other parts of Central America.
lender.occupational_info: I used to do office work in a college child care center for children of student parents.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am an entrepreneur myself, so it's great to be able to help others get started with their own businesses.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people improve their lives and the lives of their dependents by establishing and running businesses of their own
lender.occupational_info: I build cabinets, and furniture for people's homes. I try to put love into all of my work so that whatever I do makes it a happier home

lender.name: Savitha & Pradhip
lender.loan_because: I wanna help to succeed in their life.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Mary Ellyn & Ron
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in other people's lives and give them a chance to live a little more comfortably. More power to them!!!
lender.occupational_info: Since we are now retired, we enjoy traveling around the U.S. and Canada. As well, our four children (and spouses) and nine grandchildren live in the area, so baby-sitting is a frequent activity.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: Microfinancing has the potential to become the greatest financial resource to empower the third world.
lender.occupational_info: I study English literature.

lender.name: leslie
lender.loan_because: it makes me feel fantastic and it might change someone's life, who might changes more lives and I might have made a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I am a musician, sing and play guitar in a country band. It's hard work for little money (I'll be signed up on the receiving end when Kiva does the first world countries), but it's a lot of fun and I wouldn't trade it for a more financially lucrative job.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: I want others to have access to resources that will enable them to realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work for many different companies (a lot of non profit organizations) performing audits of their financial information. This is required by their their Board of Governors or by the Federal Government (because they provide funds to these organizations).

lender.name: Carlos Gonzalez
lender.loan_because: I want to help the less fortunate.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I wish to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I do research to understand and develop treatments for diseases of the brain.

lender.name: abby
lender.occupation: artist. owner of a small clay studio.

lender.name: Rosemarie
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to need money to start a business
lender.occupational_info: I have just sold my business. I started like you, 20 years ago with a small amount of money. I built my business up to a good size and then sold. I am working for the new owners for 2 years to help with the transition and then I will retire. Good luck! I know you can do it.

lender.name: Svetlana
lender.loan_because: I believe that each of us by doing his/her small part will ultimately make a difference.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage small business all over the world. As a small business owner, someone once took a chance on me and I too want to do the same for someone else. I also want to set an example for my daughters that giving is the greatest way of receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I create internet web sites for businesses, non profit organizations and events. I encourage entrepreneurship especially in women. I enjoy helping people help them selves.

lender.name: Elaine
lender.loan_because: It's a very personal way to make an impact
lender.occupational_info: Mid-level bureaucrat

lender.name: Adail Miller
lender.loan_because: I need some help for my company.
lender.occupational_info: I have a company in Brazil that make environmental services like projects

lender.name: SM Youth Group
lender.loan_because: We care about people! We are a blessed group and see it as our call to help others whenever we can.

lender.name: Tatsuo
lender.loan_because: I would like to make a contribution to some african or asian persons who wish to begin on new works.
lender.occupational_info: a japanese company's founder

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: something so easy for me can mean so much to someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I try to reduce the impacts of droughts and floods in developing countries.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I believe in counting one's blessings and sharing it with others. Paying it forward is great motto.

lender.name: Frank
lender.loan_because:
I've wandered through so many developing nations over the years, I know what a difference a micro-loan can make to a family. Bonus: It just feels good
I also tend to lend within nations that I've traveled too in the past. It just makes it more 'real' for me.
lender.occupational_info: I fly airplanes that transport people and cargo all over the world.

lender.name: Sara
lender.loan_because: On behalf of the UW-L Eagles soccer team. This is our collection of $$ to help those in need wherever they may be in the world.
lender.occupational_info: University teacher and coach.

lender.name: KCwomentowomen
lender.loan_because: We want to help other women. We want to help them be independent and take care of their families.
lender.occupational_info: Two teachers, a social worker, and two administrators

lender.name: Toni
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate as a Christmas present. What a deLightful gift to receive and give!
lender.occupational_info: Teach metaphysics and quantum physics as they refer to the world of the soul.

lender.name: Ilan
lender.loan_because: I've experienced the hospitality of the citizens of many of the countries where Kiva loans are made, and this is a wonderful way to say, "Thank You!"

lender.name: Martha
lender.loan_because: My goal is to help those less fortunate than me and I think this is a great way to do it!

lender.name: Jessica
lender.occupational_info: I teach American sign language helping hearing people communicate with Deaf Americans.

lender.name: Ian and Jenny
lender.loan_because: We been given and taken far more than most.
lender.occupational_info: One step closer to being apart of a solution and one step away from being apart of the problem.

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: We can do no great things, only small things with great love.

lender.name: Kapil
lender.loan_because: Its the best way to help people. Micro loans build relationships based on dignity and mutual respect rather than charity and handouts. They also educate in addition to providing a solution to a problem.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the computer technology industry. I have always been an entrepreneur who loves to seek out new intresting ideas and partner with hard-working and honest people.

lender.name: Bevery & Steve
lender.loan_because: my brother (Bob) introduced us to Kiva by giving us a gift certificate. Kiva seems like a great idea!

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is trying to get the money to start your own business, so I'll loan you some of what I'm making.

lender.name: Nancy Chamberlain-Fox
lender.loan_because: I believe it is God's will that I do this. I am so excited to see those who are working so diligently a make a better life for themselves and those they love and feel blessed to be able to help them reach their goals.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired secretary from a high school for students who have had a difficult time reaching their graduation goal. We helped them become the best they could be educationally, socially and emotionally and celebrated their success in becoming contributing adults.

lender.name: Phil & Barbara
lender.occupation: Phil is an Engineer and Barbara is a Paralegal
lender.loan_because: We want a world without poverty.
lender.occupational_info: Phil works on medical devices and Barbara works on employment litigation. She also volunteers with an organization that helps prisoners who claim they are factually innocent.

lender.name: Katie
lender.loan_because: I want to be able to help someone who is trying to help him/herself. I believe that sometimes the only thing a person needs is someone to believe in them
lender.occupational_info: I work helping businesses in all areas - whether it is to set up a company - enter into legal transactions so that they are well protected

lender.name: Jenny
lender.loan_because: I have become successful as an entrepreneur, and I want to help others be successful in their small businesses!
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a small tutoring business -- we help students learn!

lender.name: Toia Brown
lender.loan_because:
Why not?
Never let anyone tell you your "two cents" doesn't count...because all of us together have had quite an impact! ;o)

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: no one else will.
lender.occupational_info: I work with overweight children helping them learn how to lead healthy lives.

lender.name: Michelle
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves the opportunity to work toward their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I work with teenagers as a counselor.

lender.name: Joanna
lender.loan_because: so many people helped me over the years.
lender.occupational_info: Patience, grasshopper.

lender.name: Guinn and Nate
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Ziv
lender.loan_because: I'm blown away by this service and will let all my friends know about it !

lender.name: Rhys
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: What a great idea! I love this website and the fact that we can join together to help other members of our global family.
lender.occupational_info: On site member of construction team for new speed skating oval for 2010.

lender.name: Lindi
lender.loan_because: I believe people should have the chance to realise their dreams.

lender.name: Dennis
lender.loan_because: For the cause that lacks assistance, The wrong that needs resistance, For the future in the distance, And the good that I can do. - George Linnaeus Banks

lender.name: Eli
lender.loan_because: I like to help those that try and help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: Making things work better through innovation in design, process, and technology - in a people-centric way. The way of the 'Fu ...

lender.name: Rezjky
lender.loan_because: Helping others is priceless. Hopefully, by sharing small portion of my salary can make changes in the other parts of the world.

lender.name: Marko
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great way to make things happen
lender.occupational_info: I am a design engineer. I work in the building and industrial sectors solving all sorts of problems!

lender.name: kathryn
lender.loan_because: i like to help people realize their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I help people lead more fulfilling lives, through travel, inspiration, and moral support.

lender.name: Exsila AG
lender.loan_because:
Der Vorteil an Exsila ist, dass jedes Mitglied an einem Kreislauf teilnimmt. Artikel werden verkauft, gekauft und wieder zum Verkauf eingestellt. Ohne den stetigen Kreislauf wÃ¼rde Exsila nicht funktionieren.
Auch bei Kiva spielt der Kreislauf eine sehr wichtige Rolle. Kiva vermittelt Mikrokredite an Unternehmerinnen und Unternehmer in EntwicklungslÃ¤ndern. Ob du lieber einen Fischer in Senegal, eine Lehrerin in Guatemala oder einen VerkÃ¤ufer in Kambodscha unterstÃ¼tzen willst, entscheidest du selbst. Das Geld, welches du investierst, bleibt im Kreislauf, denn sobald die Unternehmer den Kredit zurÃ¼ckgezahlt haben, kann das Geld wieder fÃ¼r neue Investments auf Kiva eingesetzt werden.
Entwicklungshilfe mit Mikrokrediten ist eine grossartige Sache und macht mit Kiva richtig Spass.

lender.name: Valerie
lender.loan_because: Entrepreneurship is the backbone of our society. I live my life everyday with gratitude for those who have influenced my life along the way. My parents, teachers and good friends supported me through good times and bad. From that I realize that even the smallest effort of support can go a long way in this world, and in the life of someone who just needs to know that someone out there is rooting for them.
lender.occupational_info: I develop, maintain and manage a spatial database of a City's Utility, Maps, and various other datasets that are required in day to day business. I am going to school to become and EMT, and hope to become a reserve/volunteer EMT in times of need.

lender.name: Marcy
lender.loan_because: it seems silly not to, when Kiva makes it is so easy to do good for others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a stay-at-home mother to my nearly-2yr old son. I spend my days playing with him, taking him to the park, trying to run errands, and blogging/facebooking/twittering when I have a free moment or 2.

lender.name: MALGRAS
lender.occupation: Agent for shoes business from China

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I think this is a great idea!
lender.occupational_info: I am a programmer. I make websites and work with databases.

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: I believe Microfinance can be an effective approach to combat poverty by empowering individuals through access to financial services.

lender.name: Megan
lender.occupational_info: I work at a bank and support back office applications.

lender.name: Rui
lender.loan_because: I believe that anyone with the will and determination to start a new business or to start a new life shouldn't be stopped by lack of opportunities or lack of funding. If my loan can change someone's life or help create a good business, then why shouldn't one loan?
lender.occupational_info: My work consists on creating ways to use computers to help people do their work. I've worked so far with companies, banks, government organizations and medical organizations. I also make academic research on how to make computers do the work by themselves and I teach classes at the university.

lender.name: Jeommi
lender.loan_because: I want children to be educated and to live healthy lives.

lender.name: mark
lender.loan_because: i can
lender.occupational_info: freelance information technology consultant and sound recording engineer

lender.name: Robyn
lender.loan_because: it's an incredible opportunity to be able to help change someone's life and their future.
lender.occupational_info: i am a graphic designer in the Marketing department for an international playground manufacturer.

lender.name: Debbie & Mark
lender.loan_because:
We realize our contribution is a very small part of Kiva, but many small parts united can make a great difference.
"Every man must decide whether he will walk in the light of creative altruism or in the darkness of destructive selfishness." Martin Luther King Jr.
lender.occupational_info: NJ state Department of Mental Health & Services Diva, Territory Sales Manager representing the fourth greatest invention of Mankind.

lender.name: Craig & Deb
lender.loan_because: Anytime you can help someone help themselves it is a wonderful endevor!
lender.occupational_info: We are currently enrolled in college to get our nursing degree. This is our third go around in life and one we are really looking forward to.

lender.name: Joan and John
lender.loan_because: We wish our granddaughter(see pic) a better world to live in. This small gesture might help make it so.
lender.occupational_info: Joan delivers newspapers to subscribers, John drives a truck delivering product.

lender.name: Adonis
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in people's lives. They want to succeed as much as everyone else does why not help a lending hand. "Skies the limit and knowledge will never end"
lender.occupational_info: Percise and right on. I work hard but play even harder. If you don't love what you do then why stress to make others people happy. Happiness comes within..

lender.name: Ronn
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone has a social responsibilty to help those in need
